name: Rejuvenate Eidolon, Greater
components: V, S, M (a drop of your blood)
text: This spell functions as lesser rejuvenate eidolon, except that it cures 5d10 points of damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +20).
text_zh: 该法术如同次级向导治愈术 (Rejuvenate Eidolon, Lesser) 一般作用，不过它能够治愈5d10 +每施法者等级1点伤害 (最高+20)。
